name: MOTHER (itch) (studio MILK)
description:
studio  M I L K          presents 

MOTHER

MOTHER is a game about protection and survival. Its time to take off your coat, suppress your neo-liberal pacifist urges and get hyped up for a bit of kill or be killed in this fast-paced zero sum game of life. 

Try not to eat your babies.


~ created by Finn Fleming
